item.title: U.S. stocks are expensive, but Goldman Sachs says investors should keep buying them
item.description: The 2025 outlook from Goldman Sachs' Investment Strategy Group calls for an overweight position on U.S. stocks.

item.title: This part of the energy sector is in a long-term bullish uptrend, according to the charts
item.description: Katie Stockton and the Fairlead Strategies team break down the Alerian MLP ETF.

item.title: Morgan Stanley ups Tesla target, gives bull case of $800
item.description: Tesla's stock could double in a bull case on the expansion of autonomous vehicles, according to Morgan Stanley.

item.title: Investors may be overlooking a global opportunity in India. How to play it with options
item.description: Mike Khouw lays out an options strategy on the iShares MSCI India ETF.

item.title: Gold price to moderate in 2025, when massive gains will be harder to come by
